page.title: 03Cramlington:A Housing Estate
page.content:
The local estate we are describing is called{Eastfield Dale.}It was built in 1976. On Eastfield Dale there are 42 detached houses (they stand alone) 22 semi-detached and 7 terrace houses. Some have garages. All have gardens.
Most of the roads are cul-de-sacs and are safe for the children to play in.
There is no open space on the estate. The land slopes gently to the North.
Eastfield school is close to the estate but the children have to cross a road. There is an underpass (a tunnel under the road, but the children do not use it. It is too far out of their way.
Eastfield F.S.
